content: अपी [अपि-इ] {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (Mostly Vedic) {@--1@} To go in or near, enter into or upon, approach. {@--2@} To have a share in, partake of, suffer; जरामृत्युं पुनरेवापियंति <ls>Muṇḍ.</ls> {@--3@} To join, flow, flow into, dissolve, be resolved into; स्वमपीतो भवति तस्मादेनं स्वपितीत्याचक्षते <ls>Ch. Up.</ls> {@--4@} To die. {@--5@} To pour out (as a river).
